Package edu.nyu.cs.adb

Class Summary
DataManager The representation of a database site: contains a map for stored variable values as well as lock data for its own site to see which transactions have a lock on each variable
Lock  
Message A data structure that will be passed from the Transaction Manager to the Data Manager.
Message.Builder Builder class for Message
Operation Describes an operation to be done by the Data Manager
Operation.Builder Builder class for Operation
RepCRecApp This is the object that has the main function
Response A response object sent from the Data Manager to the Transaction Manager
Response.Builder A buider class for Response
Transaction A data structure defining a transaction.
TransactionManager This class will read the input and perform operations with the DataManager objects which represent the site.
WaitForGraph  
 

Enum Summary
Operation.Opcode Operation code values
Response.Status Status codes
Transaction.Status A transaction is IDLE if: The transaction started but no operation READ or WRITE were added A transaction is ACTIVE if: Default status A transaction is WAIT if: Transaction is blocked because of a lock or because it cannot commit A transaction is ABORTED if: because of Deadlocks, site failures or timeout A Transaction is END if: All commit were successful
